vdk.tanghe.plugins

Class PluginFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • vdk.tanghe.plugins.PluginFinder

  • public class PluginFinder
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Quentin Van de Kadsye and Jerome Tanghe. The PluginFinder class looks for the new files stored in the plugins directory and perform them. To launch the surveillance of the directory, you must call the start() method.
